attributes.action: C.A.M.H.S and other professionals to commission PDA
attributes.additional_details: Dr Stephen Briers diagnosed my son with PDA. I had a judge order my son to be seen by C.A.M.H.S to support the psychologist diagnosis but they do not commission PDA so we're stuck in limbo. To the point of social services wanting to put my son in foster care but luckily it was the judge that saw there was a problem and now back at the beginning. PDA was founded in the 1980's so it's fairly new. So many parents are being blamed for their children's behaviour. PDA is on the autistic spectrum
attributes.background: My son who I have always struggled with and always knew something was wrong. But after a traumatic experience my sons symptoms worsened to the point he wouldn't go to school and social services become involved they just blame me or say it's environmental surroundings. Dr Stephen Briers diagnosed PDA

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask the Government to take action to raise awareness and understanding of PDA among healthcare professionals.
